title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 648.9 - Offenses; penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 648.9 - Offenses; penalties

State Regulations
(a) Unless otherwise specifically provided, any person who violates any provision
of this Part is guilty of a violation, punishable as provided in ECL sections
71-4001 and 71-4003. (b) Personal
property, except portable tree stands as herein authorized, left on the
preserve may be removed by the commission or department. Costs for such removal
and disposal may be charged to the owner and such property will become the
property of the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
648.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
